character.age: Approximately 250 years old, but appears to be in her mid-30s due to elven aging.
character.background: Eira was born and raised in the mystical forest of Teldrassil. She was trained by the ancient Night Elf druids and honed her skills as a huntress, tracking and defending against the dark forces that threaten her homeland.

physical-appearance.hair-color: Dark brown with subtle, natural highlights of auburn and copper
